title: code-snippet, edit and execute
description: A web component to display code snippets and allows to execute them in the browser. Support html, javascript and css.

model.prompt:
The result should always be an array, even in case of a single element.
Each element in the array should represent a different programming language.
The supported programming languages are: html, javascript, css.
Aggregate related code blocks in a single array.
Prettify the provided code elements.
Use escape character for new lines, quotes and double quotes.
